tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a very wonderful experience with the doctors in Sri Aakrithi’s dental lounge. Both doctors Dr. Prithvi Raj and Dr. Akshara were very friendly and I did not feel uncomfortable at all for getting my front tooth replaced. Infact doctors were clear in explaining me the procedures of bridging which gave me confidence on taking the procedure smoothly. 

Hospitality was really good and Post replacement of tooth, following up by the doctors was really amazing. 

I would suggest anyone to go and visit these doctors without any hesitation for any dental related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had Visited for a root canal treatment..Dr.Akshara did the treatment with utmost perfection..A very friendly and professional doctor..She explained the treatment very well and was very patient to answer our questions. She checked all the tooth and warned us of upcoming issues that might affect the tooth.
reply_text: Thank you very much ma.. Means a lot

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have always been terrified of dental clinics but somehow mustered courage and visited Sri Akrithis Dental clinic wherin i met Dr Akshara who put me at ease and explained the method of treatment very meticulously.wonderful experience with root canal treatment,splendid  job,god bless the team of doctors.thanks so much for the gentle care and patience all throughout the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Akshara is calm and composed and makes efforts to explain the situations why problems arise. She explained the entire RCT procedure to make me feel comfortable and confident. She also suggested i go with some aesthetic treatments for my teeth..a problem long pending for me that was addressed by her.
Am extremely satisfied with her treatment..her expertise and experience, her attitude as she was extremely helpful in explaining all dental related queries which helped me take right decisions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Doctor did rct on my teeth and gums. The gums were partly damaged and now it's swollen and even after 3months iam facing lot of issues. Clinic won't take responsibility and I don't know what to do.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have been coming to this clinic regularly. We have taken a number of treatments from Dr. Deepthi, Dr. Akshara and Dr. Prithvi for root canal, surgical tooth extraction, scaling, cavity filling, dentures etc. They are extremely professional, understanding and not the ones who just want to extort money in the name of treatments. A definite recommendation for any dental consultation!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Had a wonderful experience. 
Dr.Akshara was able to quickly diagnose and advise on a root-canal complexity I was suffering from. 
Also consulted the clinic for cavity filling and they did a great job. Clinic is equipped with latest dental devices.  They have very experienced team of doctors who are friendly and warm. Highly recommend them!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: Dr.Akshara patiently explained the cause of the problem and addressed alignment with the teeth along with RCT. I took a number of sessions than the normal patient, but she handled my case very patiently and suggested cost-effective treatment. Thanks, Doctor

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Akshara really made me to smile again. I was very conscious about my teeth and forgotten how to smile. She is highly experienced, jovial and friendly. She takes special care to ensure that you have minimal pain or discomfort during the treatment. She took the time to explain every procedure about what she was doing. She makes you feel that you are in safe hands. I am completely satisfied with the service provided by Aakrithi's Dental Clinic.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: After RCT, I am still getting pain. When I consulted other dentist for second opinion, I was told that Root canal procedure was done incorrectly, tooth cap was not fitted properly and its measurement was not correct. I have to go through the same procedure again to get rid of the tooth pain. This experience has caused me great amount of inconvenience with respect to time and money.
reply_text: I was always asking the patient to come for a review if there was a problem which did not happen.. Minor post-op corrections will always be there which everybody should understand
